text: Alejandra Marina Oliveras (born March 20, 1978), known as "La Locomotora", is an Argentine boxer. She is the former WBC female super lightweight, WBO World female featherweight and WBA World female lightweight champion. She was born in El Carmen, Jujuy. ==Boxing career== January 5, 2012, Alejandra Oliveras won by a KO against Jessica Villafranca. The two were fighting for the vacant WBO featherweight world title. On 2013 April 19, Oliveras on her 5th defense of the featherweight title defeated Calixta Silgado on the fifth round by KO. Alejandra Marina Oliveras lost her title, WBC light welterweight, on November 15, 2014, after being defeated by Erica Farias by split decision. ==Professional boxing record== {|class="wikitable"
